definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: wound (as needing to have its matter pressed out)—fig. of injury to, or sufferings of, Isr. and Judah: [[מָזוֹר]] Ho 5:13 also Je 30:13 (Gf Che RVm; but accents Ew Ges Gie AV RV for pressing, i.e. binding up); [[מְזׁרוֹ]] Ho 5:13 (cf. III. [[זור]] Is 1:6).—[[מָזוֹר]] Ob:Ob 7 v. sub [[מזר]].
